metadata.title: Hetero-Diels-Alder reaction of 1,3-bis(trimethylsilyloxy)-1,3-butadienes with arylsulfonylcyanides. Synthesis and antimicrobial activity of 4-hydroxy-2-(arylsulfonyl)pyridines

abstract.original_text: Hetero-Diels-Alder reactions of 1,3-bis(silyloxy)-1,3-butadienes with arylsulfonylcyanides afforded a variety of 4-hydroxy-2-(arylsulfonyl)pyridines. Several derivatives show antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria.

sentences.segment_text: Hetero-Diels-Alder reactions of 1,3-bis ( silyloxy ) -1,3-butadienes with arylsulfonylcyanides afforded a variety of 4-hydroxy-2 - ( arylsulfonyl ) pyridines .
Several derivatives show antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria .
